description: This quilted vest is made with recycled polyester and PrimaLoft® insulation to help keep you warm, dry, and comfortable while considering our environment.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 28" body length (front and back), a 17.75" shoulder, and a 44.5" chest.
Mockneck with corduroy facing. Full-zip front. Leather zipper pull. Snapped storm placket. Ventilating metal grommets at the underarms. Right chest buttoned pocket. Two front waist angled pockets.
Adjustable buttoned tabs at the back waist. Fully lined and filled. "Polo Ralph Lauren" shield patch with our signature Pony at the left chest.
This product is made with recycled polyester. By turning industrial and post-consumer polyester waste into new product, we are reducing our dependence on virgin petroleum-based material.
Filled with PrimaLoft®, which is made with recycled polyester. It maintains its loft and warmth without the bulk of down.
Shell and fill: 100% recycled polyester. Lining: 100% recycled nylon.
Visit corporate.RalphLauren.com/citizenship-create-timeless-style for more information on Ralph Lauren's sustainability initiatives.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
